pages.title: 免責聲明
pages.text: 在此列出模組礦石的基本出現高度。如果你正在玩模組包、使用Optifine或者自己更改了礦石參數，這些高度可能會在你的世界中有所不同。

pages.A.title: 硝石
pages.A.text: 一種較軟的礦物，用於肥料中氮和鉀的來源。在任何高度生成。
pages.B.title: 硫磺
pages.B.text: 一種用於合成橡膠和製造火藥的活性礦物。在任何高度生成。

pages.A.title: 硃砂
pages.A.text: 一種用於提高礦石產量的紅色礦物。在任何高度生成。
pages.B.title: 瀝青沙
pages.B.text: A sticky, black, highly viscous liquid suspended in sand. Appears between Y levels 40 and 60 in deserts & badlands.

pages.A.title: 磷灰石
pages.A.text: A common mineral often used as dye or a source of phosphorous in fertilizer. Spawns at any Y level.
pages.B.title: 鎳
pages.B.text: A hard metal used in alloys less affected by heat. Appears between Y levels 0 and 128.

pages.A.title: 銅
pages.A.text: A conductive metal useful for many alloys. Spawns between Y levels 40 and 100.
pages.B.title: 錫
pages.B.text: A soft, lightweight metal valued for its versatility. Spawns between Y levels 20 and 60.

pages.A.title: 拴繩
pages.A.text: A soft, dense metal with shielding properties. Spawns between Y levels 0 and 32.
pages.B.title: 黯銀
pages.B.text: A conductive metal prized for its radiance. Spawns between Y levels 0 and 32.

pages.title: 鎳
pages.text: A hard metal used in alloys less affected by heat. Appears between Y levels 0 and 128.
